Welcome to Doctor Hoeflinger, the channel where I simplify the complex world of medicine, health, and fitness and give you perspective into my life as a neurosurgeon.

I am a board certified neurosurgeon located in Toledo, Ohio with over 25 years of experience. I'll cover topics ranging from neurosurgery to medicine to health and beyond. Subscribe and follow along to learn more!


Sign up for my free weekly newsletter where I simplify the world of health, medicine, and fitness: pages.doctorhoeflinger.com


Opinions represented on this channel are my own, and do not reflect those of my employer. Nothing posted on this channel is medical advice.

channel.description:
Thanks for stopping by the channel! 

I am a dermatology resident physician based in the US. Here on my channel, you will find all things skin and beauty related! In the past, I worked as a professional makeup artist and have loved merging this skillset with dermatology to share tips and tricks with my patients. Be sure to subscribe so you don't miss out! xoxo 

For inquiries: kaurbeauty3@gmail.com

FAQ: 
Where did you go to school? Undergraduate: UC Berkeley; Medical School: Mayo Clinic School of Medicine 
How tall are you? 5'5'' 
What ethnicity are you? punjabi!
